name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Terry L. SHAFFER, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Terry L. SHAFFER, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of October, 2001, the order of the Superior Court is hereby affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Shaw, 564 Pa. 617, 770 A.2d 295 (2001).
Mr. Justice Castille dissents on the basis of his dissenting opinion in Commonwealth v. Shaw, 564 Pa. 617, 770 A.2d 295 (2001).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: H. Stanley Rebert, District Attorney, Timothy J. Barker, Deputy Prosecutor, Office of the District Attorney, for Com.
Victor A. Neubaum, York, Malone & Neubaum', for Terry L. Shaffer.
casebody.head_matter:
782 A.2d 996
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Terry L. SHAFFER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1999.
Decided Oct. 18, 2001.
H. Stanley Rebert, District Attorney, Timothy J. Barker, Deputy Prosecutor, Office of the District Attorney, for Com.
Victor A. Neubaum, York, Malone & Neubaum', for Terry L. Shaffer.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
